summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing acceptance of grant funds from the Washington State Department of Ecology for the Solid Waste Utility's remedial Investigation/Feasibility Study for the Midway Landfill, providing matching funds for the Solid Waste Utility's expenditures on the Midway Landfill Remedial Investigation/Feasibility Study for work done after October 16, 1987.
